thread.title: Celebrate the Season of Generosity with The Coffee Bean & TeaLeaf®'s Giving Collection
thread.title_full: Celebrate the Season of Generosity with The Coffee Bean & TeaLeaf®'s Giving Collection

author: Press Release
title: Celebrate the Season of Generosity with The Coffee Bean & TeaLeaf®'s Giving Collection
text:
The most wonderful time of the year is here, bringing countless moments to connect, give, and share joy. This holiday season, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf® Philippines invites everyone to come together and Share the Cheer, celebrating kindness, warmth, and meaningful connections over every cup.
At the heart of this year’s campaign is The Giving Collection, a lineup of limited-edition tumblers and bags designed to capture the spirit of generosity that defines the holidays. More than just collectible items, The Giving Collection celebrates the joy of giving — to oneself, to loved ones, and to those in
need.
The Giving Collection: A New Name for a Cherished Holiday Celebration
For many years, The Coff ee Bean & Tea Leaf®’s holiday stamp collection has been a highlight of the season, a meaningful ritual that rewards every visit with something special to look forward to. This 2025, that well-loved experience takes on new meaning with The Giving Collection, the off icial name for the brand’s annual holiday redemption items.
Featuring five exclusive designs — the Sugar Plum and Blueberry Rush Bags, and the Moonberry, Vanilla Pop, and Citrus Fizz Tumblers — each piece combines thoughtful craftsmanship with festive design.
● Sugar Plum Bag – A spacious blue canvas sling bag with full interior padding, multiple pockets, and a sleek bean & leaf patch.
● Blueberry Rush Bag – A light purple canvas sling bag that’s both functional and stylish, perfect for everyday use.
● Vanilla Pop Tumbler – A 32oz powder-coated tumbler with a laser-engraved logo, concealed straw, and silicone handle and boot for easy carrying.
● Citrus Fizz Tumbler – A 30oz multi-color tumbler with a dual-function lid for sipping or using a straw, complete with a CBTL-branded silicone mat.
● Moonberry Tumbler – A 30oz purple tumbler with a stainless steel lid and branded metal straw, that keeps beverages hot or cold for hours.
Whether it’s a tumbler to keep your favorite brew warm or a bag to carry your daily essentials, every item is made to be a keepsake that inspires giving and sharing throughout the season.
Giving Back with the Real LIFE Foundation
Continuing its long-standing partnership with the Real LIFE Foundation, The Coff ee Bean & Tea Leaf® will once again dedicate this year’s campaign to support scholars across the country. The Real LIFE Foundation is a non-profit organization that empowers underprivileged Filipino youth through educational assistance, character formation, and leadership development, giving every cup shared this season a deeper purpose.
Festive Flavors to Share
Alongside The Giving Collection, guests can also look forward to the return of the Holiday Limited Time Off er beverages with this year’s Cookies Ice Blended® Series, available in three indulgent flavors:
● Matcha Cookie Ice Blended® – a creamy and earthy matcha blend mixed with dark crushed cookies, perfect for matcha lovers.
● Vanilla Cookie Ice Blended® – a smooth and playful twist on the classic Vanilla Ice Blended®, topped with whipped cream and cookie crumbles.
● Double Chocolate Cookie Ice Blended® – an extra-indulgent treat for chocolate fans, blending rich cocoa and dark cookie bits for a decadent finish.
Each drink off ers a festive twist on CBTL favorites — a delicious way to slow down, savor the moment, and share the cheer with someone special.
How to Take Part in the Celebration
To take home an item from The Giving Collection, guests simply need to collect 20 stamps (16 from any regular beverage and 4 from any Holiday Drink) from October 25, 2025 to January 11, 2026. Redemption will be available until March 12, 2026 at all regular The Coff ee Bean & Tea Leaf® stores nationwide.
Guests may also choose to purchase any of The Giving Collection items directly for ₱2,600 each.
Whether it’s collecting stamps, trying this year’s holiday drinks, or sharing moments of kindness with others, every visit to The Coff ee Bean & Tea Leaf® becomes a way to share the cheer — one cup, one gift, and one act of generosity at a time.
